inclusion.criterion: able to walk 20 meters independently without walking aids
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: currently exercising less than one training session per week
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: maintenance of a stable medical regimen for 4 weeks prior to initiation of study and
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: considered to maintain a stable regimen for the course of the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: signed informed consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: known or suspected non-compliance, drug or alcohol abuse
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: inability to follow the procedures of the study, e.g. due to language problems,
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: psychological disorders, dementia, etc. of the participant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: participation in another study with investigational drug within the 30 days preceding and during the present study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has tinea pedis infection, but no underlying disease such as DM. He smokes and drinks moderately.
